text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 1969. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== *5 January - Mark Tijsmans, actor, singer & children's author *24 February - Johan Terryn, actor & TV & radio host *11 July - An Swartenbroekx, actress, TV host & singer *19 July - Daisy Thys, actress *29 July - Kadèr Gürbüz, actress & TV host ==Deaths==
title: 1969 in Belgian television
